suck my dick¶

class cogs.mod.Moderation(*args, **kwargs)¶

Main moderation cog. This handles all mod commands including kicks, bans, mutes, warns, and cases.

infractions(ctx, victim)¶

Retrieves all infractions by victim and pretty-print the output

ctx (commands.Context) - Context of the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim to retrieve infractions from

kick(ctx, victim, reason=None)¶

Kicks victim from the server with the audit-log reason as REASON or a default message if reason==None

ctx (commands.Context) - Context pf the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim to kick

reason (str) - Reason of kick

ban(ctx, victim, reason=None)¶

Bans victim from the server with the audit-log reason as REASON or a default message if reason==None

ctx (commands.Context) - Context pf the command (issuer, server, channel, etc)

victim (discord.User) - Victim to ban

reason (str) - Reason of ban
